import React, { useState } from 'react' import InputForm from '../InputForm/InputForm' import styles from "./Signup.module.css" export default function Signup() { const [values,setValues] = useState({ name:"", email:"", pass:"" }) const [errorMsg,seterrorMsg] = useState return (

SignUp

(setValues((prev)=>({...prev,name:event.target.value})))}/> (setValues((prev)=>({...prev,email:event.target.value})))}/> (setValues((prev)=>({...prev,pass:event.target.value})))}/>
{errorMsg}
) }
